item.title: Scraping business data from Google Maps using AI and AgentQL
item.description: Writing web scraping scripts by hand typically follows a development pattern like:

item.title: Fresh vanilla is the best flavor of wow
item.description: Stepping back into a living world that has had a lasting impact on our lives brings a feeling of nostalgia that is very pleasant. Like watching your favorite movie/show for the nth time, we find enjoyment in playing our favorite games again. It brings us back to a time when things may have been simpler, or more chaotic, and this game brought peace to our lives.

item.title: Out of the rain
item.description: What my dad calls the "Wall of Water" just hit his town. It's a yearly flip in the weather where the rain begins and doesn't stops until spring. Nearly 4.25" of rain landed on them today.

item.title: The Coffee Consistency Trap
item.description: Having a cup of coffee is like flicking the flow switch to the on position. One sip and I'm in. My fingers feel lighter and every problem that comes to my mind is quickly solved and the solution typed out.

item.title: Gustav Klimt's constant creation
item.description: I was exposed to Gustav Klimt's artwork today and it was fascinating. I can clearly see how some of his work has inspired many of the video games and shows that have entertained me.

item.title: Hidden files for a cleaner Obsidian
item.description: In this guide, I'll show you how I achieved a cleaner, more focused writing environment without sacrificing any of Obsidian's powerful functionality

item.title: Obsidian Git on iOS
item.description: A step-by-step guide on how to connect your obsidian vault that is stored on Github to your iOS device.
